title: Hello
content:
hello everyone
it's has been a while i want everyone to know that i'm still here. but i now have other ambitions like money making programs i know they probalby waste time & everything but i so hooked on them. i'm now doing a course which i thought when i flunked nelson park my life was over but i was wrong just because you may not have done as well during your teens doesn't mean that you are finished. i'm now trying to catch up on maths & english which i ignored years ago as i was a rebellious teenager & didn't want to learn anything. i still have my website job pay hasn't changed that much only went up 11 cents to $3.71 an hour. looking at moving website hosts as the st.l server keeps crashing all the time, checking out [url=http://www.crazydomains.com.au/]crazydomains[/url] their hosting starts at $54 a year which is really cheap in australia as most plains are over $20 a month. i am off to new zealand in janurary next year with a group of people. trying to save up $500 as spending money then the nightmare comes currency conversion. i shoudn't have to worry that much the aussie & kiwi's dollars have a small weakness in the market but you don't lose that much, i'm still here but my email is now [url=mailto:rorboy1983@gmail.com ] rorboy1983@gmail.com [/url] so you can email me on that email address now, my website url is still [url=http://www.rorie1983.com]www.rorie1983.com[/url] but is currently unaccessible because of server problems, what have you others been upto since my absence?Rorie

title: Re: Hello
content:

title: Re: Hello
content:
Hi, glad to see you around. Certainly agree that it's never too late to change things, good luck with that school work. What I've been up to? Well, I honestly can't remember. title: Re: Hello
content:
Hmm... well good luck with that Rorie. Um... nice to see you back. Make some polls... I think DaVince misses them.

What have I been up to? I would rather not say. Although something cool is coming up.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

content:
